title: How to Make an Abbey Cocktail

steps.headline: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.
Pour the gin into the cocktail shaker.
Pour the orange bitters into the cocktail shaker.
Pour the orange juice into the cocktail shaker.
Pour the orange bitters into the cocktail shaker.
Shake the cocktail shaker until mixed.

text: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.  Pour the gin into the cocktail shaker.  Pour the orange bitters into the cocktail shaker.  Pour the orange juice into the cocktail shaker.  Pour the orange bitters into the cocktail shaker.  Shake the cocktail shaker until mixed. Strain into a cocktail glass. Add the maraschino cherry.
